titles.title: To amend the Clean Air Act to allow emission reductions caused by fleet turnover to be credited to the emission reduction requirements of the Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 1/11/1995--Introduced. Amends the Clean Air Act to allow emission reductions attributable to fleet turnover to be creditable against required reductions in Moderate ozone nonattainment areas.
